Name: POWER
About the game: Power is a global political and economic simulation game where you can play as a powerful politician or businessman in many countries. Starting from nothing, you can seize the highest offices in the land through free and fair elections, or dirty tricks and deals. Power is a massively multiplayer political simulation game, and allows you to compete with hundreds of other players in a detailed world. Power currently simulates in detail: Presidential & Congressional elections in the United States Parliamentary elections in the UK, Canada and Australia Full legislatures where you can wheel and deal to pass your bill to change a large number of laws, which directly effect your country and the wider world Economic simulation for each region, run by private corporations owned and operated by players A detailed and realistic stock market system where you can invest and trade in said player run corporations Player run unions and strikes Geopolitics between the player run countries, including war! And much more! So join up and start your rise to Power today!
